author: Staff Reporter
text: The Government has transferred P. Parthiban, Project Director of District Rural Development Agency (DRDA). According to a Government notification, Mr. Parthiban, an officer belonging to the AGMU cadre has been transferred and posted as the Regional Administrator-cum-Additional District Magistrate of Yanam relieving Chaure Ratanghosh Kishor who has been asked to report to the Chief Secretary.
title: DRDA project officer transferred
